description: Master registry of all third-party software integrations

integrations.description: Connect to Salesforce CRM for managing contacts, accounts, opportunities, and more
Payment processing platform for accepting payments, managing customers, and subscriptions
Custom CRM integration with multi-header authentication for contacts and leads management

Freshdesk is a cloud-based customer support platform that helps businesses manage tickets, automate workflows, and deliver fast, personalized service. It offers multi-channel support across email, chat, phone, social media, and web, along with powerful features like knowledge base, SLA management, collaboration tools, and AI-driven assistance to improve customer experience.

HubSpot is a customer platform that offers a suite of products for marketing, sales, and customer service, along with a central CRM. Its products include Marketing Hub, Sales Hub, and Service Hub, which are designed to help businesses attract and engage customers, manage leads, and provide support, all unified in one place.
ConvertKit is now known as Kit, an email marketing and automation platform for content creators, including bloggers, podcasters, and online course creators

Zendesk is a cloud-based software company that provides customer service and support solutions, including a ticketing system, live chat, and AI-powered tools to manage customer interactions across various channels like email, social media, and messaging.
GitHub is a web-based platform built on Git, an open-source distributed version control system. It serves as a central hub for developers to store, manage, and collaborate on code projects.

Slack is an AI-powered productivity and team communication platform that centralizes workplace conversations, tools, and data into a single, searchable interface known as a "digital-first ecosystem for work". It is designed to make work life simpler, more pleasant, and more productive, primarily by reducing reliance on email and minimizing context switching between different applications.
